label: Activity Type
desc: Type of activity investigated by the case (Housing/Zoning case, Unfit Buildings, etc.)

label: Address
desc: Street address of the case investigation.

label: Scope
desc: A brief description of the proposed scope for the case.

label: Case Sub-Type
desc: The sub-type of the Case. For example, a “HOUSING” type of CITATION, etc.

label: Open Date
desc: The date that the case was opened. (This date may have been preceded by inspections on an allegation, with the case opened only after determining that a violation exists).

label: Last Inspection Date
desc: The date of the last Compliance inspection so far.

label: Last Inspection Result
desc: The result of the last Compliance inspection so far. Note that a “Failed” inspection may result when even a single item is not yet in compliance

label: Compliance Status
desc: Indicates the type of compliance achieved, or the final outcome of the case. “Open” indicates that work is still in progress to achieve compliance.

label: Latitude
desc: Latitude of the address where the case is being investigated.

label: Longitude
desc: Longitude of the address where the case is being investigated.

label: Coordinates
desc: Mapping coordinates of the address where the case is being investigated.
